data.description:
Generated by orchestration session orch-1771131013094-yumlqg.
Objective: Fix all P0 bugs: bead action latency, duplicate beat creation, wave tree display, filter/tag issues, and filter logic
Agent plan:
- 3 x fullstack (debugging)
Assigned beads:
- foolery-0j4: Investigate and fix bead action latency (~10s)
- foolery-fo1: Prevent duplicate beat creation on repeated Done clicks
- foolery-c47: wave tree shows closed parents and omits wave id in title
- foolery-i22: don't show wave tags
- foolery-z26: "Ready" filter is wrong, is missing In Progress
Notes: foolery-c47 blocked by foolery-b9r, foolery-i22 blocked by foolery-cgc — both assumed resolved given retry/in_progress status. Prioritize foolery-0j4 (latency) as highest-impact bug.
Assumptions:
- foolery-b9r (blocker for c47) is resolved — c47 is tagged stage:retry with 1 attempt
- foolery-cgc (blocker for i22, ra5) is resolved — both are tagged stage:retry
- Waves can run sequentially but Wave 2 beads have no hard dependency on Wave 1 — sequencing is for practical agent management
- All unassigned beads are P1+ priority and excluded from this P0 plan
